thread.title: If You’re A “Game Of Thrones” Fan Then You'll Be Very Excited To Know THIS Character May Return
thread.title_full: If You’re A “Game Of Thrones” Fan Then You'll Be Very Excited To Know THIS Character May Return

author: Crystal Ro
title: If You’re A “Game Of Thrones” Fan Then You'll Be Very Excited To Know THIS Character May Return
text:
::Whispers:: “About time!” ID: 10577636 2. But, fair warning, if you want to go into Season 7 as blind as Maester Aemon, then definitely stop reading here because there are some potentially major spoilers ahead. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed / HBO ID: 10577655 3. Okay. So, let’s just recap where things were left with all the direwolves on Thrones …Oh, THAT’S RIGHT – aside from Ghost THEY’RE ALL DEAD. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed / HBO ID: 10577699 4. Well, maybe not ALL dead – lookin’ at you, Nymeria. View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed / HBO ID: 10578187 5. Because, according to Watchers on the Wall , Maisie Williams has been spotted in and around Calgary, Canada recently. And fans there have even said she was in town for “filming.” View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed / Maisie Williams / Via instagram.com ID: 10577749 6. Whatever, right? WRONG. Because, Calgary is also where Instinct Animals for Film is based – the group that provides the trained wolves for green screen filming on Thrones . View this image ›
Spin VFX / Via youtube.com One of their wolves, Quigley, has been playing Jon Snow’s lovely all-white direwolf Ghost since 2015 .
ID: 10577758 7. And they also just posted a photo of a wolf who is CLEARLY not Ghost with a very interesting “ready to work” caption and Thrones hashtag. View this image ›
@instinctwolves / Via watchersonthewall.com According to Watchers on the Wall , this photo was posted around the same time Maisie showed up in Calgary, so…….
ID: 10577761 8. For comparison, here’s Nymeria the last time we saw her in Season 1, Episode 2 (YEAH, it’s been that long!) side by side with this new wolf. View this image ›
HBO / @instinctwolves / Via watchersonthewall.com Admittedly, they’re not exactly TWINS, but it’s still preeeettt close.
ID: 10577965 9. For a refresher, the last time we saw Nymeria, Arya had to FORCE the direwolf to run away because she was afraid Joffrey would have her killed for attacking him (fuck you, Joffrey) – and also, sorry, Lady. And fans have been wondering ALL THESE SEASONS since what happened to Nymeria?!?! Because, let’s be real, there’s a VERY good chance she’s still alive.
ID: 10578003 10. SO DOES THIS MEAN ARYA AND NYMERIA WILL REUNITE IN SEASON 7?!?!?! View this image ›
Crystal Ro / BuzzFeed / HBO Because, if so, then we’re going to be ugly crying for about a week straight. Also – if it turns out this is just ~some other~ direwolf, that’s cool, too. Here for as many direwolves as possible.
ID: 10577775 11. Praying to the old gods and the new that this reunion comes true. ID: 10577873
